full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Request for Proposal for Receiver Kit

### Solicitation Number
U6800-244072/A

### Tender Title
Receiver Kit

### Trade Agreement
This procurement is subject to the Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP).

### Procurement Method
The tendering process is open to all interested suppliers. The Crown reserves the right to negotiate any aspects of this procurement.

### Delivery Requirements
The bid request is for a Receiver Kit as detailed in the Annex A Statement of Requirement, which must be delivered by March 29th, 2024.

### Evaluation Criteria
The selection will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

### Contact Information
Danish Hussain
Phone: (873) 355-4364
Email: [danish.hussain@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:danish.hussain@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
